name: The Pumpkin Patch
description:
Help your friend Sam test out her family's pumpkin patch farm for Halloween. But nothing is as it seems!

Controls: keyboard and mouse

  • Keyboard: 
    • w,a,s,d = movement
    • e = interact
  • Mouse: look around

OS: Windows 10

The Squirrel Squad Team:

Aaron Daly: Programmer (https://katuta.itch.io)
Lauren Pham: Music & SFX Designer
Alan Lin:  Dialogue
Josh Davis: Art Director (https://twoislandgames.itch.io/)
Manny Cabacungan: Tech Artist (https://mannycjr.itch.io)
